```{r, results='asis', echo=FALSE}
data <- iris %>%
    as_tibble() %>%
    janitor::clean_names()
mlist <- list(
    m1=lm(sepal_length~., data=data)
    , m2=lm(sepal_length~.-1, data=data)
    , m3=lm(sepal_length~sepal_width+petal_length, data=data)
    , m4=lm(sepal_length~sepal_width+petal_width, data=data)
)
stargazer::stargazer(mlist, title = "Model comparison", header = F, type = "latex")
```
